channel.title: Making market! (idk what else)
channel.description:
Hey guys! So, the last time I made a art logo making market, AGAIN, it went bad. This time, I’ve made changes around the marketing skills. Here’s where you can promote your art business. Thanks @cursed for the help you’ve given me for. And now here’s the changes!
* I’m always open for commissions!
* I make: Art, logos, cover art & album art.
* DM me for which one you need!
Okay, that’s all for today folks! @iammane, sorry if I made you upset about this, but people need their logos, art, cover art or album art helped by me. Gtg, peeps!

item.title: Making market! (idk what else)
item.dc:creator: lemonboy
item.description:
Look, here’s one thing I know: how about I make a background not with a black background. I’ll use one of my photos I took yesterday that is perfect for the logo, sounds good?

Read full topic

item.description:
can you make a blank background with text that says xlxk in arial font 144 point 3000x3000 res output cmyk color and png format with noise reduction filter layered on? If not no worries

item.title: Making market! (idk what else)
item.dc:creator: crystldawnmusic
item.description:
lemonboy:

but people need their logos, art, cover art or album art helped by me.

You’re right, I do need help from you. Could you make me a logo? No guarantees that I’ll use it, but I’d love3 to see what it looks like. Thanks!
